name: Lost in the dark (AdrKacz)
description:
My best score is 49, quite hard to achieve! Comment your best ⏱ Lost in the dark In development - MiniJam 98 - Empty

The world is empty. There is nothing but you 🌗 And you are desperately looking for light 💡 

How to play?

W / Z  / Up Arrow: Move forward

S / Down Arrow: Move backwards

Q / A / Left Arrow: Move left

D / Right Arrow: Move right

R: Restart

How to score?

When you reach the green light you score! And you go to the next maze!

When you fall or hit Restart you restart the exact same maze! You don't lose points.

How do mazes differ?

Each maze is randomly generated 🎲

The further you go, the bigger the mazes are!

The sound is buggy!?

When you click Start, the music bugs for a while and then all come back to normal 😖 If you know how to solve it, post a message or contact me!

It's annoying to go capture the mouse!

When you start playing your first maze, you must click on Click to look around to capture the mouse. Same as above if you know how to make this less painful 😣 

Credits 3D Assets

All from the awesome Kenney!

Sound and Music Assets

Daughter of the Void by Bensmir

Footsteps and Sound effects by Kenney

Fire sound on Gamesounds
